entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Westport
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:35 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kingston Airport 6:00 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 1.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 81 %
Dewpoint: -1.5°C
Wind: NNE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 40 percent chance of flurries later this evening. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning late this evening. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and overnight. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
